Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
      .hmmessage P  {  margin:0px;  padding:0px  }  body.hmmessage  {  FONT-SIZE: 10pt;  FONT-FAMILY:Tahoma  }     They seem to be all over the sound chip, so it must be important. I almost never get technical advice. 'Used As Exactly Standard Into Unit-That'd Be Wonderful-(sight-card{Blind Aide?})--Realtime English-Certain Contact'. I think it means to not use the random pulses, that would just confuse the chip, it'll have to be provided with random words( the numbers). Great, load all those numbers into a register/memory, and then use a pic chip, or basic stamp to output them randomly to the Speakjet--simple!
 
 I sent this the Speakjet group too! that oughta make some brianiacs heads cock sideways! Especially since one thier names was mentioned! 
 

  Frank-S
